text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, arrā to kare no shito o shinji nasai. Mata shito ni kudasa reta Keisuke to, izen ni kudasa reta keiten o shinji nasai. Oyoso arrā o shinjinaide, tenshi-tachi to sho Keisuke to kare no shito-tachi, soshite shūmatsu no hi o shinjinai mono wa, tashika ni tōku mayoi satta monodearu
